casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Levar Jamel ALLEN. No. 485PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 20, 2004. Richard Jester, for Allen. Michael K. Lands, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of October 2004 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 24th day of November 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of October 2004."
